name: onwards
content:
onwards adverb
(TIME)
from 6 o'clock, March, the 1870s, etc. onwards
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 beginning at a particular time and continuing after it: I'm usually at home from five o'clock onwards.

onwards adverb
(DIRECTION)
C2 If you move onwards, you continue to go forwards: We sailed onwards in a westerly direction.
